title: Chinese Salad with Mini Rice and Sesame Pancakes
ingredients: ['75g long-grain rice', '200ml vegetable stock, made with a stock cube', '1 orange', '3 tbsp walnut oil, or groundnut or sunflower oil', '1 tsp soy sauce', '1/4 red cabbage, about 250g, finely shredded', '125g walnut pieces, broken into smaller pieces if large', '3 tbsp sesame seeds', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '2Â½ tbsp sunflower oil', '1/2 head Chinese cabbage, about 300g, shredded', '100g young, tender pak choi leaves, halved lengthways if large']
